title: Time of download shown in receive column rather than time of email receipt on server
content: I have an overnight email sent from one of my programs which, when sent via gmail smtp, showed the correct time/date received. Spamhaus didn't like this and I was flagged. Now, I have switched the smtp to my own domain, it shows the time I opened the email in thunderbird rather that the time the server received it. Looking at my email account via the web access, the received time is correct. By way of a test, I have Postbox on my pc and I added my account to that. It did the same thing, showing the time that Postbox viewed it, rather than server receipt time. I have searched on the web and, although I can find time zone issues, I find nothing like this. Can anyone suggest any areas of investigation I should be looking at? Many thanks.
creator: gordon47

title: Update new-message-number label not showing up in folders/subfolders
content:
My issue is that the label near the mailbox name shows the corrrect number of not-read messages BUT when i expad the mailbox, thunderbird won't show where the new message is by adding the same label to the correct folder in the tree.

I have many folders and subfolders up to 4 levels and i noticed that if the new message gets moved by a filter straight to a subfolder (in the last instance in a 4th level subfolder) then there is no trace of the new-message label anywhere and i have to expand each folder containing subfolders in order to find out where the message is.
creator: alessandro.gallo.a

title: PROBLEMI CON THUNDEBIRD
content:
Buongiorno, dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento di Thunderbird, non funziona più lo scrolling verticale con la rotellina del mouse (ovviamente vi contatto perchè solo nel programma thunderbird non funziona - per tutto il resto si). Questa cosa sta rallentando enormemente il lavoro. Non funziona nemmeno più la funzione di ordine delle mail per data. Anche la funzione di filtro delle mail sta dando problemi.

Si stava benissimo con la versione precedente, riuscite ad aggiustare o a mandarmi una versione precedente? Grazie
creator: studio82

title: MyThunderbird mails also towards my Mobile
content: How can I receive My Freeler-Thunderbird mails in my Samsung Galaxy A34 mobile ?
creator: willemvank

title: mails also  towards  my mobile
content: How can I receive My Thunderbird mails in my Samsung Galaxy A34 mobile ?
creator: willemvank

title: Not showing any Mail in inbox
content: Hi, since the update to Supernova i can't se any mail in my Inboxes, Tash, Archives, ... I Can see that new Mails are downloadet as the number next to the inbox is counting and changing color, but no Mails are displayed or can be selectet no matter if i change the layout of the view or switch between grouped folders or all folders. i can't even right clic on any of the shown folders. the whole place where the mails used to be displayed stays white. Add-ons are all disabled and i also tried to delete one mail account and integrated it new. i can send new Mails but they also are not displayed in any of the folders. is there a way to fix this or a workarround.
creator: berni3

title: Firma con immagini, testo evidenziato con colori e link di collegamento
content: Salve, sono nuova su Thunderbird. Ho appena migrato la posta da Outlook a T. e sto cercando di impostare i vari parametri, tra cui la firma che dovrà essere presente in tutte le mail. Come potete vedere dall'immagine allegata, la firma contiene l'immagine col nome della ditta dove lavoro, testo evidenziato e link di collegamento per download di file. Mi chiedevo come impostare questa firma, visto che posso solo gestire o semplice testo o html nelle impostazioni dell'account. Ho provato vari siti per tradurre questa cosa, ma sembra impossibile e quindi al momento non mi resta che fare il copia/incolla su tutte le mail a mano. C'è un modo automatico per impostare questa firma? Grazie. Sara Bisaro
creator: licenze

title: Issue with Email Sending after Update to Version 115 (Custom SMTP port and STARTTLS)
content:
Hello everyone,

I would like to report an issue I have encountered after updating to Thunderbird version 115. Prior to the update to this version, I had no problems with sending emails. However, after updating to version 115, I have observed the following error:

Error Description: When configuring the SMTP server connection with STARTTLS enabled and a custom port (2500), email sending fails. The issue does not occur if I disable STARTTLS or use the standard port 25 (with STARTTLS).


Current Behavior: Email sending fails with Error message attached


SMTP Log of Thunderbird: mailnews.smtp: Sending message <122d4dfb-e197-48f4-b81b-f262e5b97537@example.com> SmtpService.jsm:88:18 mailnews.smtp: Connecting to smtp://email.example.com:2500 SmtpClient.jsm:123:19 mailnews.smtp: Connected SmtpClient.jsm:395:17 mailnews.smtp: S: 220 mail.example.com - Restricted SMTP server is waiting for your HELO/EHLO

SmtpClient.jsm:418:17 mailnews.smtp: C: EHLO [192.168.15.224] SmtpClient.jsm:622:19 mailnews.smtp: S: 250-mail.example.com

250-PIPELINING

250-SIZE 48720000

250-ETRN

250-STARTTLS

250-AUTH PLAIN LOGIN

250-ENHANCEDSTATUSCODES

250-8BITMIME

250-DSN

250 CHUNKING

SmtpClient.jsm:418:17 mailnews.smtp: C: STARTTLS SmtpClient.jsm:622:19

mailnews.smtp: S: 220 2.0.0 Ready to start TLS

SmtpClient.jsm:418:17 mailnews.smtp: C: EHLO [192.168.15.224] SmtpClient.jsm:622:19 mailnews.smtp: SecurityError: a SecurityProtocol error occurred SmtpClient.jsm:442:17 mailnews.smtp: Socket closed. SmtpClient.jsm:518:17 mailnews.smtp: SecurityError info: SSL_ERROR_HANDSHAKE_FAILED SmtpClient.jsm:458:21 mailnews.send: Sending failed; The message could not be sent using Outgoing server (SMTP) email.example.com for an unknown reason. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again., exitCode=2153394004, originalMsgURI= MessageSend.jsm:337:32 sizeToContent() is deprecated and will be removed in the future. commonDialog.js:120:9

Environment: We have a number of installations across Europe, and this issue seems to be specific to few offices only (for now). Other installations are functioning correctly even with the new version.


I tried to solve it with internet providers, but according to their emails they don't block aything ...

Thank you for your assistance in addressing this issue!
creator: martin.korf

title: Thunderbird does not understand files such as dwg, 7z and others.
content: Hi! I am using Thunderbird 115 on Windows 11. I can't set the default application for some files, if I open it in an email. Thunderbird cannot identify them and therefore defines them as application/octet-stream. As I understand it, the problem is in mimetypes. How do I set some file types to open in this application?
creator: el.burceva

title: font size
content: I installed 115 but it was terrible so I went back to 102, however, some of the issues with 115 came with the downgrade. My biggest problem is the font size. Incoming mail is so small that I can't read it so have to turn on the magnifier (which is awful) to read it and I don't want to do that every time. I even find the whole interface is too small - like the font on the tool bars etc. I am an older adult and this is very stressful for me. Hope there is an easy fix. Thank you.
creator: loopygram1

title: Thunderbird Supernova becomes unresponsive
content:
Since updating to Thunderbird Supernova is becomes unresponsive at some point when left in the back ground and working in another app. This might happen within 30mins or after a few hours.

This has been happening consistently for the few days it's been updated.

I have tried opening it in safe mode with the add-ons disabled, but the same thing happens.

Not sure where to go to from here, any help or suggestions most appreciated  ?

The only other issue I've noticed is that calendar notifications won't dismiss but will close. However they keep popping up after the event has passed and will do so unless I delete the event.
creator: paul574

title: Rotating Color Ball Always Showing Up.  Program Is Essentially Unusable.  Help, PLEASE
content:
Hello,

Help, please. Sr. Citizen now, and this is driving me crazy. Using on a Mac, Thunderbird vers.115.3.2. 64 Bit

Don't know if it updated to this vers, automatically, or if I may have asked for the update.

Anyway, used to be rock solid. Worked flawlessly.

Now, all that happens is that rotating colorful ball. Continuously. Or, maybe, goes away after 10 minutes or so. Maybe. Then, it (usually) does show latest eMails.

Essentially unusable due to that rotating ball that always shows up irrespective of whatever you want to do.

What is wrong, please ?

I Un-clicked "Enable Global Search and Indexer" and also Un-Clicked "Use Hardware Acceleration When Available"

What should I do ? Can I revert to an older revision that actually works ?

I'm probably, as usual, missing something basic, but I can't imagine what.

Would be most grateful for any thoughts, or suggestions.

Much thanks, Bob
creator: rgsrose2

title: desktop application thunderbird & 1c
content:
Hello! In versions of thunderbird up to 115.3.2, when dragging a letter into 1c, it was attached as a file, but now it is deployed there. To move it to a file, you must first save it and only then upload it to 1c. Questions: 1. Are there solutions? 2. How does drag and drop work in thunderbird now?

The problem is not on the 1s side
creator: minussaber

title: Add Security Exception | Won't proceed
content:
I'm trying to add a New Email Account>When I do, a Pop-up box appears with the heading "Add Security Exception">The Security Setting is correct, so I "Confirm Security Exception">When I do, the Entry isn't being accepted and the Pop-up Box just keeps reappearing which doesn't allow me to move forward/Finish the set-up.

What is the solution?

Any help would be greatly appreciated.
creator: connman

title: Se cuelga thunderbird
content: Buenas tardes. Des de la última actualización hace unas dos semanas, thunderbird se me cuelga cada dos por tres, como mínimo una vez al dia, se queda pensando y tengo que cerrarlo y abrirlo de nuevo... llevo años utilizándolo y nunca me había pasado. Quería preguntar si sois conscientes de ello y si lo estáis trabajando, o puede ser un fallo de mi configuración y que deba cambiar algo, aunque no he tocado nada des de hace años... Ya me direis. Muchas gracias. Albert.
creator: albert66

title: Duplicate folders since recent update
content: With the recent Supernova update I now have duplicate folders for both my email addresses. It's confusing and annoying and I want to clean it up. Not sure what to do. What is safe to delete and what do I need to fix/change so that it doesn't happen again? Any ideas? THANK YOU!

content: My wife and I have separate computers. Mine is working fine. When she goes to create a new email there are no menu bars at the top of page for sending or any other options. Gary Johnson gajohnson@tds.net my computer pielady@tds.net wife computer (can't send emails)

content: Reduce the comany's 2/3rds occupation of my email screen
creator: keithhook1

title: Spam getting moved back to inbox - what's happening?
content:
Thunderbird seems to recognise spam pretty well, but every 20 or so spam mails will for some inexplicable reason be moved back to the inbox.

It IS marked as spam by thunderbird, and the option to return it to the "spam"-folder implies that it has been correctly placed initially. (See picture)

What's going on?
creator: SandyLoams

title: supernova: divider bar in Classic View is worse wrt to new messages
content:
In Classic View of prior version of Thunderbird, I could set the divider btw email headers and the message pane just below the latest msg, and new mail would show above the divider. That way we could see the Subject and Sender of the new arrival.

in 115 the behavior for moving the divider is different (and not as good). Moving the divider brings down more message headers from the top - it's impossible to have a partially blank space [where new mail would go] below the last message.

Please restore the old behavior for this small detail in your next release!
creator: mspiegel

title: Duplicate Drafts folders
content:
tb v115.2 Suddenly I have found I have two Drafts folder. The file names are:

imap://myemailaddress%40gmail.com@imap.googlemail.com/Drafts

and

imap://myemailaddress%40gmail.com@imap.googlemail.com/%5BGmail%5D/Drafts

New draft messages tgo to the first folder above. Attempts to move files from the other folder fail with an error message from the server. This problem has happened since the 102 to 115 upgrade.

There are messages in both. How do I fix this without losing things.
creator: lordjohn

title: Bulk modification to view columns for RSS feed folders
content:
I have a preferred set of columns that I would like to apply to all my RSS feeds in Thunderbird 115.

In theory, the GUI provides a way of doing this ("Apply all columns to..."). However, this doesn't seem to work for RSS feed folders in the same way as mail folders, and no one has identified a way to make it work (see previous question: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1425573).

What's the best alternative way of doing this in bulk? I can see that the .msf files for the folders contain data like the below:

(DC=12)(DD=$121)(DE ={"selectCol":{"visible":true,"ordinal":"1"},"threadCol":{"visible":false,\ "ordinal":"3"},"attachmentCol":{"visible":true,"ordinal":"5"},"senderCol":{"vi\ sible":true,"ordinal":"7"},"subjectCol":{"visible":true,"ordinal":"9"},"unread\ ButtonColHeader":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"11"},"statusCol":{"visible":false\ ,"ordinal":"13"},"deleteCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"15"},"sizeCol":{"visi\ ble":false,"ordinal":"17"},"flaggedCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"19"},"acco\ untCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"21"},"priorityCol":{"visible":false,"ordin\ al":"23"},"unreadCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"25"},"totalCol":{"visible":f\ alse,"ordinal":"27"},"idCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"29"},"recipientCol":{\ "visible":false,"ordinal":"31"},"junkStatusCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"33\ "},"tagsCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"35"},"correspondentCol":{"visible":fa\ lse,"ordinal":"37"},"receivedCol":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"39"},"locationCo\ l":{"visible":false,"ordinal":"41"},"dateCol":{"visible":true,"ordinal":"43"}})

That seems to be what I'm looking for, but I'm reluctant to make a direct edit since the overall format of the file isn't clear.

Is there a better way to make the change in bulk?
creator: pg_78

title: Thunderbird is hangs every time I try to add a hyperlink (win10)
content: Thunderbird (Windows, 115.3.2) is crashing every time I try to add a hyperlink. The message that I'm working on freezes and I cannot close it except using the Task Manager. I would like to simply install the previous version, but I can't seem to find that. I have tried re-installing 115.3.2 to no effect.

title: NONE OF THE LINKS IN THUNDERBIRD WORK. I have to right click, copy the link, open Chrome and paste the link.  The same problem exists with all browsers so the problem is clearly with Thunderbird.
content: Figure out why links no longer work in Thunderbird. I use the latest version and am running Windows 10 desktop. I've tried Firefox, Edge, Chrome, etc. and the problem exists with all. Therefore it must be a Thunderbird problem. My donations will begin when this is fixed.

title: Emails are being sent with text in gray, not the black I enter
content:
This just started today. I enter text in my emails as black on white. When I send them and look at them in the Sent folder, the text font is now a light gray. If I send a message to myself, I read it as light gray.

How do I get the font to remain black on white?

I have restarted Thunderbird, as well as rebooting the PC.

I have unchecked "Use reader's default colors" and set them to black on white, with no effect.

I have not messed with the CSS file.

Thanks.

Andrew


Environment --

Windows 11, version 22H2 (OS Build 22621.2428) Thunderbird 102.15.1 (32 bit)

Thunderbird settings --

General: 

   Language & Appearance / Fonts & Colors       Fonts for:  Latin          Fonts:  Sans Serif, Cambria, Calibri, Consolas          Allow messages to use other fonts (checked)       Size:  14

Composition: 

   HTML Style      Variable width / Medium      Use reader's default colors (checked)

Account Settings: 

 Compose messages in HTML format (checked)

content:

Under Account Settings: my email name@mail.brighthouse.com Outgoing Server (SMTP) Spectrum-mail.brighthouse.com ( dDefault)

Under Server Settings Username - my email address port 993 Connection Security none. Password trasnmitted insecurely...

creator: elnegrao2003

title: MANNUALLY MOVE FOLDERS
content:
Before this change to version 115 I was able to use the 'add-on' "Manually Sort Folders" which came in VERY handy for organizational purposes because I have lots of folders and I need the ones I use the most above the others. Now everything has been placed in alphabetical order and I can't find any way to change it and the old 'add-on' says it's not compatible with version 115. WHY????? If the whole purpose of this new version is to make things easier for users then why take away add-ons that are ACTUALLY helpful?

Is there any other way in this new version to move my folders manually so that I don't have to scroll all the way down the line to find the folder I need?????
creator: melmcc

title: My filters cannot be edited  Window has no close button V115.3.2 32bit
content: This worked up to the more recent version update. Dell Laptop,16GB WIndows 10 Home TBird V115.3.2 32 bit When I try to update r change a filter for my emails, there is no close window button and the changes I make do not register any actual changes in how the filter works. The window that opens does not allow for scrolling and it is too big to see the entire window. If I make a new filter, the filter is made and does work. It seems to be in the edit mode there is a problem.
creator: BMWRed735i

title: Thunderbird email login
content: Since the latest Thunderbird update 16 October 2023, I have been unable to log into my email account. I keep getting "400. That’s an error. The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That’s all we know."

content: Thunderbird desktop updated and I absolutely hate the new format. It is harder to search and read emails. How do I convert back to previous format

title: printing pdf
content: When printing a pdf attachment within Thunderbird the new version adds the drive location of my Thunderbird profile at the top of the printed pdf. If opened after saving to a drive, it's not there. Why on earth would it do that? Please fix.
creator: fxsmith2

title: Thunderbird don´t get mail from POP3 any more
content:
Unable to download email to mailbox. Check that the file system has write permissions and that there is enough disk space to copy the mailbox.

SWE (Det gick inte att ladda ner e-post till e-brevlådan. Kontrollera att filsystemet har skrivrättigheter och att det finns tillräckligt med diskutrymme för att kopiera e-brevlådan.)

This error has occured on my POP3account now last months. First it came just sometimes but now it comes all the time and I cant get any mail on this gmail-account anymore. In same Thunderbird v 115.3.2 I have lots of IMAP-accounts and they work fine. I have had Thunderbird since about 2007 and almost all mail is stored in the program so it is a lot of mail.

Tried to delete the POP3-account and reinstall but it just gets same 10 old mails from last month over and over. Don´t know why these mails are coming through again and again and not any newer mail.

I have done the compress, no result. Diskspace free 780GB of 980GB

Image of my Thunderbird Screen and the error that accures after these ten mails are loaded.

Diskspace problem, why?
creator: thomas.storgard

title: Search bar new layout
content:
Hi,

I have lost the second "local" search bar with the new update and can't seem to find any setting to bring it back.

I used to search my e-mail in one specific folder by subject, body, sender, etc. and the specific folder's content would adjust to display only the e-mails that fit the keyword typed in the search bar.

Now this is gone and I am left with the main search bar on top of my window only, and whenever I look for a keyword it opens a new tab in Thunderbird and there are no 'filter by' options. The result is that I can never visualize the message in its folder, or fine adjust the search locally.

Can you please help?? Hopefully you encountered this change with the new update too and know exactly what I'm describing. It's a shame that the layout is being changed radically without notification on how to brign back these features.

Thank you in advance,
creator: Thunder_Jay

title: This is my list of issues with 115.3.2 (64-bit)
content:
Since the automatic upgrade to 115.3.2 (64-bit), I have experienced - 1) The inbox window bounces down when I delete a message, requiring a scroll back up to the point in the inbox list where I had been. Is not constant, happens about 75%. 2) When I open Thunderbird, it does not access the IMAP server on the 1st attempt. The only fix I know is to close and open TB until it does, which is usually on the 4th or 5th attempt. 3) The font has been changed. I liked that on previous upgrades, it stayed as is. 4) A whole bunch of menu items are now relocated, requiring me to hunt around just to do the things I have done for years. This is a trash move on the part of Mozilla, something I would only have ascribed to Microsoft.

If I could go back to the previous version that is still on my laptop, I would. I am praying you do not force this version on that machine.

Other than that, I appreciate Mozilla and have used your free products for years!!

System config - Dell Studio XPS8000, i5, 750@2.67ghz, 16.0 GB, 64-bit OS, Win 7, SP1 (don't laugh, it works better than the Win10 machine)
creator: nrgmagic

title: Can not delete multiple emails at the same time
content: I have always been able to select multiple emails (either click and shift click for a range, or click and control click) and then click on the delete button to delete them all. It is not working now. Thunderbird 115.3.3 on windows 10
creator: ff114

title: Pairing thunderbird on 2 computers
content: I was using thunderbird on a single computer (NUMBER ONE) and everything was running very well but I was fed up of running 20 yards between office and workshop so put it on another computer in my workshop (NUMBER TWO). The computers are linked (paired) via google. I have 4 IMAP email accounts with outlook and one that runs via our website on POP but I have some niggling problems with this account including. 1. When I send an email from computer two it also sends the email to number one as well as the recipiant. 2. All emails show on computer two as unread even if they have been read on computer one so I have to mark them as read. If I open the email on number two it does not show on number one. 3.This may have cured itself with the latest updated programme last week but when I sent an email it was storing 3 times in SENT EMAIL? Andy ideas? In plain language please as I am not brilliant on computers
creator: apoole10661

title: Some messages don't change to unread status
content: I upgraded to 115.3.2 recently. The problems I had earlier when I tried the upgrade with headers slow to appear seems to be fixed. Thanks for all the work of the developers in tracking down issues in the new version. I note that I still have a minor problem with a few emails: they do not change from bold to regular text when I read them. It only happens on a few emails, on the order of 1 out of 50. If I leave open the offending email long enough, meaning several minutes often, it will change. So I guess there is some other minor issue remaining with this function. I am running on Windows 10. There is nothing I can recognize that is different about the emails that show the issue, although I may just be missing it.
creator: marklang

title: Thunderbird keeps rejecting E-mails from one address even though it's whitelisted
content: So, I belong to a website where one can post stories, and since late last month, I've been unable to get alerts from that website since Thunderbird keeps rejecting E-mails from the bot that sends out the alerts. I tried whitelisting the bot by putting the E-mail address into my personal address book for both my IMAP and POP accounts and making sure the "Do not automatically mark mail as junk if the sender is in Personal Address Book" option is checked, but the E-mails keep getting rejected. Is there any way to fix this?
creator: dylanb007

title: where can I find information on how to use QuickNav?
content: When I enter a term in QuickNav, I can only be taken to the first instance. How can I get to instances 2 through 5 (or so)?

title: TB 115.3.1 for Mac - where did my inboxes go?
content:
I just upgraded to TB 115.3.1 and the panel on the left side of the TB window is missing a LOT. I attached a picture of how it looks after the upgrade.

"Inbox" at the top shows nothing! I actively use four email accounts. Prior to upgrading, inboxes for all four accounts were grouped together at the top so I could quickly switch between inboxes. Now there is nothing there. I can still get to each inbox by scrolling down in the list of items in the left-side panel, but that will be very time consuming and awkward. Is there a way to get all of the inboxes grouped together at the top?

Similarly, for Sent messages: It shows two of my four email accounts, which is better than Inbox which shows zero of four. How can I get the Sent messages section to show all four of my email accounts?

Please help! Thanks, Clint
creator: clintoconner2

title: Displaying all the subfolders.
content:
Hello.. Recently updated to 115.3.2 here.

I have my emails sorted into folders, under the inbox. Within each folder are subfolders.

The new release has changed things a bit...

When I start TBIRD, now all the subfolders are expanded out, and I have pages and pages of them.

It used to just display the folders, and I would like to get back to that display, please.

How do I achieve this, please?
creator: steveblower2

title: Junk mail controls not working
content: No matter what I do, mark Not Junk or move to inbox, some of my mail is going to Junk and these are from people in my contacts and I have been corresponding with them for years. Meanwhile I still get some scam mail (Bigpond scams in particular) that I move to junk or try to block and they still come to my inbox. I have changed settings to a learning mode but so far no learning. Anyone else having this problem???
creator: sandrageorgette

title: Thunderbird: impossibile trasferire il profilo da un pc all'altro
content: Non è la prima volta che trasferisco il profilo di da un PC all'altro, ma questa volta con Windows 11 mi è impossibile. Eppure ho copia/incollato la cartella Thunderbird dalla cartella Roaming del vecchio PC nella cartella Roaming del nuovo PC (così sovrascrivendola) ma proprio non ne vuole sapere (ho provato e riprovato). Cosa ci può essere di diverso in Windows 11 rispetto ai precedenti SO? Eppure ho anche guardato il video e non viene fatto niente di diverso. Ancora non ho neppure installato un'antivirus sul nuovo PC.
creator: Roby33

title: Thunderbird 115.3.3 can no longer view any mail and can't open any folder that contains mail
content:
Problem started right afer I upgraded.

I have been running Thunderbird 115.3.1 (32 bit) since its release in July. Ran great, really like this long over due upgrade toThunderbird. Today, Oct 18 I upgraded to Thunderbird 115.3.3 and now can no longer view any mail and can't open any folder that contains mail. Old or new, doesn't make a difference.

Interaction with Thunderbird seems to depend on whether the folder contains mail or has a sub (child) folder that contains mail. The results of double clicking any folder that has mail depends if that folder has more than 1 subfolder.

1) If the folder has no child folders double clicking has no effect. Nothing happens. I can right click and select the folder but get no options.

2) If a folder does have multiple child folders, double clicking will open the parent folder and display the child folders. But none of the child folders will open.

I'm running Windows Server 2008 R2 (64 bit) 2 x Intel Xeon E5-2690 3.2Ghz processors, 196GB RAM, 3 x 3TB hard drives.
creator: ronlovell

title: Visual Change Reversal
content:
My thunderbird app has just updated to the new supernova build I don't know why, but there's a couple visual changes that have occurred that aren't tied to the new features that are advertised on the main page

there are two main things I'm looking to do here 1) restore the old density options (on the previous build, it was perfect for me, but now the smallest density setting is too cluttered on the mail list, but the medium density is too spacious on the folder list) 2) have new messages display in the parenthesis next to the name of the folder instead of a right aligned bubble

If these options are not available in the new build, could I please be directed to a download of the previous version?

thank you, Ria

I am running with ubuntu 22.04

Thank you..............

title: Used my settings from my webmail and still won't work in Thunderbird
content:
Hey folks.

I have used Thunderbird for my Gmail acounts with no issues.

Decided to move all my work accounts into Thunderbird as I was using Mailbird for them and occasionally emails email seem to hang up and get stuck, too many for me to want to stay.

I entered all the settings from my cPanel settings but it simply won't work for either of my work emails.

They work just fine on Mailbird except the issue mentioned and I checked the server settings there and every thing matches.

Just won't work on Thunderbird.

Any ideas?
creator: me388

title: Want Thunderbird sync
content:
We appreciate and enjoy the settings continuity within Mozilla Firefox, allowing us to operate across multiple devices with same passwords etc.

Why can't we get that same functionality with THUNDERBIRD? Traveling away from the office with Thunderbird on my tablet I lose access to emails stored in folders in my main PC. I have tried the migrating process before and after trips abroad but it never collects ALL my emails. Most recently, the migrating method picked up setting, folders and emails up to 2021 - but nothing more recent. Consequently, I had to travel without a proper record.

The 'migration' process is clumsy and unreliable.

Why can't we open a THUNDERBIRD account on any device and find all our work, settings and history as we do with Mozilla Firefox?
creator: Robimars

title: Change Font color and background color of the buttons that now (115.3.1) populate the Left pane
content:
Hi All, This 115 update looks like it has Chicken Pox with all the circles and boxes that now appear on the left pane to give counts.

I want to change the background of these circles and rectangles to white and the Font color to black.

How do I do that, please.

Oh By the Way (not the topic of this post): 1. when I select an account in left pane and click Read Messages on right, the only action that occurs is it switches to inbox. Does NOT read messages. Fortunately if I Right Click on account I can choose Get Messages and read mail that way. 2. Two of my family are in a panic because they cannot Send mail at all, since the update. 3. For me TB crashes sometimes. That has NEVER happened in past. 4. If any Developers are reading this ... I have read other posts about changing other Font specs etc and it requires creating new css file and writing css code, etc. While I can do all that myself the average TB user cannot. They will be intimidated by it. It is quite unfriendly. How about just put ALL settings in the about:config area?

Thanks !!
creator: rp108
